code:
%%{Groupware_ChatRoom}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [Groupware_IssueTracker] --> Idle: App Start
    
    Idle --> Recording: Start Recording
    Recording --> Paused: Pause
    Paused --> Recording: Resume
    Recording --> Saving: Stop Recording
    Paused --> Saving: Stop Recording
    Saving --> Idle: Save Complete
    
    Idle --> Loading: Load Session
    Loading --> Ready: Session Loaded
    Ready --> Playing: Play
    Playing --> Paused2: Pause
    Paused2 --> Playing: Resume
    Playing --> Ready: Stop/Complete
    Ready --> Idle: Close Session
    
    state Recording {Groupware_WikiPage] --> Capturing
        Capturing --> Capturing: Packet Received
        Capturing --> BufferFull: Buffer Limit
        BufferFull --> Flushing: Auto-flush
        Flushing --> Capturing: Flush Complete
    }
    
    state Playing {Groupware_KanbanBoard] --> Emitting
        Emitting --> Waiting: Packet Emitted
        Waiting --> Emitting: Delay Complete
        Emitting --> [Groupware_IssueTracker]: Last Packet
    }
    
    note right of Recording
        Captures:
        - Timestamp
        - Direction
        - Raw hex
        - Decoded JSON
        - Action name
    end note
    
    note right of Playing
        Replay Options:
        - Speed: 0.5x - 4x
        - Seek to position
        - Step forward/back
        - Filter by action
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
